in_progress.title: GCodeMerger
in_progress.description: A small program to make multi-color printing easier with single extruder printers. Slice different colors of the model and merge the G-code with this.

in_progress.title: EComDB
in_progress.description: Interface with a small database to keep track of my electronic components (amount, datasheet links, etc)

in_progress.title: FunLilPygameProject
in_progress.description: Fun little pygame project with Madeleine Hunter that we're working on.

complete.title: Stepper595
complete.description: A simple Arduino library meant to make stepper motor control fast and easy. Built to utilize SPI to control the motors through a 74HC595 shift register.

complete.title: This site
complete.description: This site is meant to kinda be a portfolio I guess, while also being a hub for my project info and a learning experience.

complete.title: ButtahBot
complete.description: ButtahBot is a fun little discord bot I'm working on to play goofy sounds and do funny little interactions with friends.

complete.title: Auto Shade Controller
complete.description: Arduino sketch intented to control two window shades through stepper motors and a light sensor and is IR remote controlled.
